mapper.insert: INSERT INTO docs_holiday ( emp_no, holiday_type, holiday_start, holiday_end, replacement, holiday_reason ) VALUES ( #{emp_no}, #{holiday_type}, #{holiday_start}, #{holiday_end}, #{replacement}, #{holiday_reason} )
mapper.select: SELECT e.dept_name, e.name, e.emp_rank, e.phone, e.m_approver, e.f_approver, dh.no, dh.holiday_type, dh.holiday_start, dh.holiday_end, dh.replacement, dh.holiday_reason FROM docs_holiday dh,emp e WHERE dh.emp_no = e.no AND dh.NO = #{holiday_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO docs_trip ( emp_no, docs_no, location, reason, bt_start, bt_end, food_money, room_charge, tran_cost, tran_local_cost, etc, team_cnt ) VALUES ( #{emp_no}, #{docs_no}, #{location}, #{reason}, #{bt_start}, #{bt_end}, #{food_money}, #{room_charge}, #{tran_cost}, #{tran_local_cost}, #{etc}, #{team_cnt} )

INSERT INTO docs_trip_proposer ( trip_no, dept_name, emp_rank, name, private_num, replacement, account ) VALUES ( #{trip_no}, #{dept_name}, #{emp_rank}, #{name}, #{private_num}, #{replacement}, #{account} )
INSERT INTO docs_trip_etc ( trip_no, g_num, help, b_num ) VALUES ( #{trip_no}, #{g_num}, #{help}, #{b_num} )
mapper.select: SELECT no, location, bt_start, bt_end, trip_status, DATE_FORMAT(trip_reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') trip_reg_date, team_cnt FROM docs_trip WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no} AND trip_status = #{trip_status} ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT #{limitcount},#{contentnum}

SELECT dtp.dept_name, dtp.emp_rank, dtp.name, dtp.private_num, dtp.account, dtp.replacement, dt.no AS holiday_no , dt.docs_no, dt.location, dt.reason, dt.bt_start, dt.bt_end, dt.food_money, dt.room_charge, dt.tran_cost, dt.tran_local_cost, dt.etc, dt.team_cnt FROM docs_trip dt, docs_trip_proposer dtp WHERE dt.no = dtp.trip_no AND dt.no = #{no};
SELECT g_num, HELP, b_num FROM docs_trip_etc WHERE trip_no = #{trip_no};
SELECT proposer_no FROM docs_trip_proposer WHERE trip_no = #{trip_no};
SELECT etc_no FROM docs_trip_etc WHERE trip_no = #{trip_no};
SELECT e.f_approver FROM emp e,docs_trip dt WHERE e.no = dt.emp_no AND dt.no = #{docs_no}
